title.rendered: arge Microfiber Cleaning Towels, 36-Pack, Ultra Soft Plush Wash-Cloths

content.rendered:
• 【 Easier Cleaning and Drying Ever 】Cleans without chemicals, Bulk Pack of 3 Dozen Microfiber Towel Cleaning Cloths for Professional Grade Detailed Clean-Up. Perfect for Car Paint, Stainless Steel Metal, Wood, Window Glasses, Leather and Plastics
  • 【 Surface Safe Scratch Free 】Streak-Free Double sided microfiber Cleaning Towels are ultra plush and Lint Free to Wear off Dusts to Bring Shinning Gloss. Ultra Soft Prefect for Car Detailing, Leather Goods and Even Instruments
  • 【 All Purpose Cleaning 】 Furniture, Windows, Granite Marble Counter-Top, Mirrors, Bathroom, Vehicles, SUVs, Autos, Bikes, Boats, Machinery, Silverware, Cookware, Utensils, Glasses
  • 【 Wash and Dry Quickly 】 Fast Air Drying Reusable Micro-fiber Towels. The Color is Micro-fiber Cloth Will Not Fade as Regular Cotton Towels or Wash Cloths Fade Quickly
  • 【 Wet and Dry Dual Purpose 】 The Microfiber Towles can used for dust removal of dry cloth and polishing of car or furniture, also can be moistened with water or detergent to clean the surface, soft enough to protect the surface from scratch

excerpt.rendered: Large Microfiber Cleaning Towels, 36-Pack, Ultra Soft Plush Wash-Cloths, Professional Grade Premium Micro-Fiber Detailing Cleaning Cloths for Car, Household and Commercial (Orange, 16″ x 16″)
